metadata.title: Wednesday, 19th February, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of Luansobe Boarding Secondary School in Masaiti District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is;
(c) who the contractor for the project is; and
(d) what the total cost of the project is.
(a) what the rationale for the introduction of the Free Education Policy from Early Childhood Education to Grade 12 was;
(b) what the benefits of the Policy are; and
(c) what measures are being taken to ensure that all children of school going age benefit from the Policy.
(a) when the following newly constructed health facilities in Lundazi Parliamentary Constituency will be operationalised:
(i) Matembe; (ii) Chanyondo; (iii) Chideza; and (iv) a maternity wing at Mkomba;
(b) what the cause of the delay in operationalising the facilities is; and
(c) when the Government will procure equipment for the above health posts.
